beantype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.PropertyExtension
beantype.description: A path extension defintion for a RapidEnv property containing any path. The platform specific path separator is automatically used in order to prepend or append the extension.

property.name: propextmode
property.description: Defines wether to "prepend" or "append" this path extension.

property.name: value
property.description: The environment variable's (default) value. Could be platform specific when using the "osfamily" attribute.
